text: [Chapter 08] [Altar Town, Nation of Altar]
(The town is ravaged, with the ground is covered in destroyed buildings and flames...)

speaker: left
text: What happened here?

speaker: left
text: (Is that Bladeous?)

speaker: left
text: Hey! What happened here?
(Bladeous attacks Bladen)

speaker: left
text: Hey! What's happened to you?

speaker: left
text: You aren't the one who did this, are you?

speaker: left
text: Everyone, prepare for battle!

speaker: right
text: Bladen...

speaker: right
text: The Itucher isn't... here anymore...

speaker: right
text: They took it... the Nolavillians...

speaker: left
text: Nolavillians?

speaker: right
text: I tried to stop them... and I activated the Itucher...

speaker: right
text: But I wasn't... worthy...

speaker: right
text: I... couldn't control it's power...

speaker: right
text: My allies... the townspeople... I...

speaker: right
text: I... killed them all...

speaker: right
text: But I couldn't even... defeat the Nolavillians...

speaker: right
text: It was pointless... I failed...

speaker: right
text: And who knows... what will happen now...

speaker: right
text: The Shadow Realm... that's where they're taking it...

speaker: right
text: They said it would be... the key to creating an artificial dimensional...

speaker: right
text: The fourth generation... Xuir...

speaker: left
text: Xuir!?

speaker: right
text: It's... starting to take over... again...

speaker: right
text: Seal me in the temple... while I'm still weakened...

speaker: left
text: ...understood.
(Bladen puts Bladeous in the Altar Temple and performs a sealing spell on it.)

speaker: left
text: ...I know what I need to do.

speaker: left
text: I've been avoiding this for too long, but it was inevidable.

speaker: left
text: I'm going to go to Nolavillia and take back the Holy Itucher.

speaker: left
text: My family's been the guardians of the Altar Temple, but I've never wanted to do it...

speaker: left
text: ...but the whole world is at stake here.

speaker: left
text: We'll be heading to Nolavillia as soon as we can.

speaker: left
text: Nolavillia... I haven't been there since the incident...

speaker: left
text: Nolavillia, huh. I'll go wherever the artifacts are.

speaker: left
text: Going to Nolavillia? I wonder if it'll help me get stronger...

speaker: left
text: Nolavillia... rad name bruh.

speaker: left
text: Nolavillia? I hope they have lots of damage!

speaker: left
text: Nolavillia, I wonder what it's like...

speaker: left
text: Nolavillia? Sounds fun, I'm going.

speaker: left
text: Guess I'm going to Nolavillia now.

speaker: left
text: We'll need to go back to Static to get resources and a means of transportation.
